title: Anthony Davis of the Dallas Mavericks leaves the court with an adductor muscle injury during an NBA game against the Houston Rockets | National | bigcountrynewsconnection.com
text:
[]
Anthony Davis of the Dallas Mavericks leaves the court with an adductor muscle injury during an NBA game against the Houston Rockets
- Tim Heitman
-
- Updated
Tags
As featured on
Anthony Davis, the star forward who landed in Dallas in the shock trade that sent Luka Doncic to the Los Angeles Lakers, will miss at least two more weeks with an adductor muscle strain, the Mavericks said Thursday.
